Identify.oai:repositoryName: UC Los Angeles, Special Collections, Young Research Library: Pamphlet Maps Collection on California

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Official transportation and city map of Los Angeles, California and suburbs

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : col. ; 111.5 x 75 cm. on sheet 114.5 x 80.5 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: "Copyright 1911 by Laura L. Whitlock for Los Angeles Ry."
"Los Angeles Railway Company, operating city system. Color of cars and lines map [yellow]"
"Pacific Electric Raiway Company, routes of interurban system operating to points indicated at margin of map. Color of cars and lines on map [red]"
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by copyright beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owner. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.
UC Regents
Department of Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, U.C. Los Angeles

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Faust's map of city and county of San Francisco California

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : col. ; 58 x 73 cm. on sheet 65 x 80 cm. folded to 16 x 1 in cover 18 x 10 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: Includes inset map "General view of San Francisco Bay"

On front cover: "Shows blocks numbered, streets, car lines, ward boundaries, parks, squares, cemeteries, wharves, original water front line, half-mile cirtcles from the bay, government reservations, and a general views of the bay and county surrounding the city"
Relief shown by hachures and spot heights
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by copyright beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owner. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.
UC Regents
Department of Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, U.C. Los Angeles

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : col. ; 40.7 x 73 cm. on sheet 44.3 x 76 cm. folded to 15.5 x 9.8 cm. and tipped into bound cover 16.5 x 10.8 cm

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The official map of Orange County, California and portions of adjoining counties

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : col. ; 50.6 x 51.7 on sheet 54.5 x 55.7 cm. folded to 15 x 9.5 cm. tipped into cardboard portfolio 16.5 x 10.4 cm

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : col. ; 35.5 x 30 cm. on sheet 43.8 x 35.2 cm. folded to 12.5 x 8 cm. tipped into bound cover 12.7 x 8.8 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: Includes inset map "City of San Francisco"
Map of California identified in California Gold Rush Bibliography. Verso of map has population statistics for the counties of California, Census 1952
Title from cover of binding: Map of California
